description: Scrapes MitRat (מית"ר) funding data for school 144097, generates static HTML, uploads to yisumatica
features: Playwright headless scraper for MitRat ASP.NET WebForms
Text-based table parser (fallback for non-standard GridView rendering)
Static HTML generation with RTL Hebrew layout
known_issues: Must use python -B to avoid pyc caching
ASP.NET postback timing is inconsistent — sometimes needs a retry
MitRat may return different table counts on different runs
